CouchBase

24 Aug 2014

Version 2.5.1

World's most complete, most scalable and best performing NoSQL database.

By combining the massively popular Elasticsearch, Logstash and Kibana (ELK platform overview) we have created an end-to-end stack that delivers actionable insights in real-time from almost any type of structured and unstructured data source.

Highlights

Scalability Performance Availability

Trade-off

Builtin Cache Auto-sharding Incremental Map-Reduce Monitoring UI Geographic strength Multiple Connectors

Key-Value Document based

No HTTP API
